thread.title: Australia Shares Lower Amid Broad Selloff
thread.title_full: Australia Shares Lower Amid Broad Selloff - WSJ

author: Robb Stewart
title: Australia Shares Lower Amid Broad Selloff
text: 0140 GMT [Dow Jones] Australian stocks are down sharply amid a broad selloff, echoing Friday’s drop in U.S. shares as investors again focus on worries about global growth in the wake of the Federal Reserve’s decision last week to leave interest rates steady. The ASX 200 is down 2.6% at 5034.9, nearly wiping out the index’s gains over the previous three sessions. The Fed in its decision highlighted global weakness and economic concerns, which has added to investor uncertainty and is proving a recipe for share market selling, CMC Markets chief market strategist Michael McCarthy says. “A lack of major data releases...
